page.title: 16GIRL GUIDES IN 1985.
page.content: My name is Claire Nicholas and I live at "The Jays", Upper Langwith with my parents, grandma and brother Alistair, who is fifteen. My parents take me to Pleasley every week to join in with the Guides there. It takes about ten minutes to get there so I start at 6.50pm to get there at 7.00pm.When I get there we have to wait until the Brownies have finished, then we go in. If it is warm we go for a walk in the woods or go tracking, which is marking a trail by making arrows out of chalk or things of nature like twigs or stones. Ten minutes later other Guides have to follow your trail. Some people call this "hare and hounds". Sometimes we have a tester who comes to test us for our badges.
